mets:div.LABEL: Outside details -- main cornice, brackets, dormer rake, rake for main cornice, dormer cornice, other entablature

Outside details -- cornice on butler's pantry extension, part elevation of balustrade, main cornice above sleeping porch, balustrade & cornice over bay windows, sleeping porch windows, cornice over staircase windows, sill & seat for staircase window, mullion for sleeping porch windows.
Details of window frames, etc. -- double hung windows in shingled walls, double hung windows in cement covered walls, mullion, French windows, wood grilles, basement windows.
Main staircase -- elevation & section, part plan, details of newel, balusters and handrail
Pantry drawings -- elevation looking north and elevation looking west of butler's pantry, elevation and section of kitchen pantry : Sheet A.
Detail drawings -- half elevation of seat, etc. ; front entrance door ; veranda doors ; rear entry doors ; first, second & third story doors ; half plan of seat ; seat & arch details ; door details.
Part elevation and section of trim for dining room ; part elevation with elevation & section of trim for first & second story halls ; details in sections of head & jambs of trim for living room.
Mantel, etc. in dining room -- front view i.e. elevation, end view, plan, details ; mantel, etc. in living room -- front view, end view, plan, details.
